verses.verse: Therefore thou shalt love <S%H157><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> his charge, <S%H4931><s%> and his statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and his judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and his commandments, <S%H4687><s%> always. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>

And know <S%H3045><s%> ye this day: <S%H3117><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I speak not <S%H3808><s%> with <S%H854><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have not <S%H3808><s%> known, <S%H3045><s%> and which <S%H834><s%> have not <S%H3808><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the chastisement <S%H4148><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> <S%H853><s%> his greatness, <S%H1433><s%> <S%H853><s%> his mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and his stretched out <S%H5186><s%> arm, <S%H2220><s%>

And his miracles, <S%H226><s%> and his acts, <S%H4639><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he did <S%H6213><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and unto all <S%H3605><s%> his land; <S%H776><s%>

And what <S%H834><s%> he did <S%H6213><s%> unto the army <S%H2428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> unto their horses, <S%H5483><s%> and to their chariots; <S%H7393><s%> how <S%H834><s%> he made <S%H853><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> to overflow <S%H6687><s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them as they pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you, and how the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath destroyed <S%H6><s%> them unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%>
And what <S%H834><s%> he did <S%H6213><s%> unto you in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> ye came <S%H935><s%> into <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> place; <S%H4725><s%>

And what <S%H834><s%> he did <S%H6213><s%> unto Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram, <S%H48><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab, <S%H446><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben: <S%H7205><s%> how <S%H834><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6475><s%> <S%H853><s%> her mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and swallowed them up, <S%H1104><s%> and their households, <S%H1004><s%> and their tents, <S%H168><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the substance <S%H3351><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was in their possession, <S%H7272><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> acts <S%H4639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he did. <S%H6213><s%>

Therefore shall ye keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> ye may be strong, <S%H2388><s%> and go in <S%H935><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> go <S%H5674><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it;

And that <S%H4616><s%> ye may prolong <S%H748><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the land, <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> unto them and to their seed, <S%H2233><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> that floweth <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey. <S%H1706><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> goest in <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, is not <S%H3808><s%> as the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from whence <S%H834><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> ye came out, <S%H3318><s%> where <S%H834><s%> thou sowedst <S%H2232><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy seed, <S%H2233><s%> and wateredst <S%H8248><s%> it with thy foot, <S%H7272><s%> as a garden <S%H1588><s%> of herbs: <S%H3419><s%>

But the land, <S%H776><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> go <S%H5674><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, is a land <S%H776><s%> of hills <S%H2022><s%> and valleys, <S%H1237><s%> and drinketh <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> of the rain <S%H4306><s%> of heaven: <S%H8064><s%>

A land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> careth <S%H1875><s%> for the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> are always <S%H8548><s%> upon it, from the beginning <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7225><s%> of the year <S%H8141><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> the end <S%H319><s%> of the year. <S%H8141><s%>

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> if <S%H518><s%> ye shall hearken diligently <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and to serve <S%H5647><s%> him with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> your soul, <S%H5315><s%>

That I will give <S%H5414><s%> you the rain <S%H4306><s%> of your land <S%H776><s%> in his due season, <S%H6256><s%> the first rain <S%H3138><s%> and the latter rain, <S%H4456><s%> that thou mayest gather in <S%H622><s%> thy corn, <S%H1715><s%> and thy wine, <S%H8492><s%> and thine oil. <S%H3323><s%>
And I will send <S%H5414><s%> grass <S%H6212><s%> in thy fields <S%H7704><s%> for thy cattle, <S%H929><s%> that thou mayest eat <S%H398><s%> and be full. <S%H7646><s%>

Take heed <S%H8104><s%> to yourselves, that <S%H6435><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> be not deceived, <S%H6601><s%> and ye turn aside, <S%H5493><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> them;

And then the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> wrath <S%H639><s%> be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against you, and he shut up <S%H6113><s%> <S%H853><s%> the heaven, <S%H8064><s%> that there be <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> rain, <S%H4306><s%> and that the land <S%H127><s%> yield <S%H5414><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> her fruit; <S%H2981><s%> and lest ye perish <S%H6><s%> quickly <S%H4120><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> you.

Therefore shall ye lay up <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> these <S%H428><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> and in <S%H5921><s%> your soul, <S%H5315><s%> and bind <S%H7194><s%> them for a sign <S%H226><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> your hand, <S%H3027><s%> that they may be <S%H1961><s%> as frontlets <S%H2903><s%> between <S%H996><s%> your eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

And ye shall teach <S%H3925><s%> them <S%H853><s%> your children, <S%H1121><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> of them when thou sittest <S%H3427><s%> in thine house, <S%H1004><s%> and when thou walkest <S%H1980><s%> by the way, <S%H1870><s%> when thou liest down, <S%H7901><s%> and when thou risest up. <S%H6965><s%>
And thou shalt write <S%H3789><s%> them upon <S%H5921><s%> the door posts <S%H4201><s%> of thine house, <S%H1004><s%> and upon thy gates: <S%H8179><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> may be multiplied, <S%H7235><s%> and the days <S%H3117><s%> of your children, <S%H1121><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> them, as the days <S%H3117><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> if <S%H518><s%> ye shall diligently keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H2063><s%> commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> you, to do <S%H6213><s%> them, to love <S%H157><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and to cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto him;

Then will the LORD <S%H3068><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and ye shall possess <S%H3423><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> yourselves.

Every <S%H3605><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> whereon <S%H834><s%> the soles <S%H3709><s%> of your feet <S%H7272><s%> shall tread <S%H1869><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> yours: from <S%H4480><s%> the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the river, <S%H5104><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates, <S%H6578><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> the uttermost <S%H314><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> shall your coast <S%H1366><s%> be. <S%H1961><s%>

There shall no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> be able to stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall lay <S%H5414><s%> the fear <S%H6343><s%> of you and the dread <S%H4172><s%> of you upon <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> that <S%H834><s%> ye shall tread <S%H1869><s%> upon, as <S%H834><s%> he hath said <S%H1696><s%> unto you.
Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I <S%H595><s%> set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> a blessing <S%H1293><s%> and a curse; <S%H7045><s%>

<S%H853><s%> A blessing, <S%H1293><s%> if <S%H834><s%> ye obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H413><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> you this day: <S%H3117><s%>

And a curse, <S%H7045><s%> if <S%H518><s%> ye will not <S%H3808><s%> obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H413><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> but turn aside <S%H5493><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> to go <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye have not <S%H3808><s%> known. <S%H3045><s%>

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath brought thee in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> goest <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, that thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the blessing <S%H1293><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Gerizim, <S%H1630><s%> and the curse <S%H7045><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Ebal. <S%H5858><s%>

Are they <S%H1992><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> by <S%H310><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> where the sun <S%H8121><s%> goeth down, <S%H3996><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> which dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the champaign <S%H6160><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the plains <S%H436><s%> of Moreh? <S%H4176><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> shall pass over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to go in <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> you, and ye shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it, and dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein.

And ye shall observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you this day. <S%H3117><s%>
